title: Wanted: Vampire - Free Blood
description: Three years ago, death blew out the candle in Alexis Hall's life and left her devastated. Nothing could replace what she'd lost, not even the sexy stranger she awoke married to. Still, she finds it hard to ignore the dangerous sparks he triggers within her. She knows Bradley Cox took advantage of her. What she doesn't know is he holds a secret that will change everything.But Bradley isn't her only concern. In a moment of desperation to somehow reclaim what she had lost, Alexis made an offer to a vampire--free blood. Her blood. In a story of heartbreak and obsession, a simple ad changed Alexis' life forever and on one fateful night her dreams and her nightmares will collide. Can she trust Bradley? Or is he her worst mistake? Can she retract her offer to the vampire? Or will she fall under his deceptive spell?
author: Lisa Rayns
